name: Idle Farm Tycoon - Cash Empire
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a farm operator? Now "idle farm" is the chance to achieve it! Simulate the most realistic farm operations. Use your strategy to attract customers and expand!

Manage your farm, use your strategy to expand the manor, attract the customer all over the world!

A casual and simple way to play, idle farm let you be the next cash tycoon!

Game Feature:
• Realistic simulation of agricultural product harvesting and sales
• Get idle money, even when you offline
• Expand your farm to build more and earn more
• Smooth and easy gameplay
• Various achievement to complete
• Picturesque game scenes and 3D graphics
